data.title: Harischandrudu
data.text:
Harischandrudu is a 1980 Telugu, Political drama film. The film was directed by U. Visweswar Rao. Jayachitra surprisingly sang a song in her own voice for herself MUTHUMANTA. [1]

HarischandruduDirected byU. Visweswar RaoStory byU. Visweswara RaoProduced byU. D. Murali KrishnaStarringPrabhakar Reddy

Jayachitra

Savitri

Banerjee

DevikaCinematographyMohana KrishnaEdited byR. Hanumantha RaoMusic byT. Chalapathi Rao
